body: Ogre destroyers are chosen by the powers of chaos and evil to walk the world on a dark quest to break, maim, eat, torture, and kill everything beautiful, peaceful, or pure.
name: Ogre Destroyer

sections.ac: 24, touch 10, flat-footed 24 (+9 armor, +1 deflection, +5 natural, -1 size)
sections.special_attacks: channel negative energy (DC 15, 4d6), smite good 3/day (+2 attack and AC, +7 damage)
sections.other_gear: mwk full plate, +1 greatsword, javelins (3), belt of mighty constitution +2, cloak of resistance +1, headband of alluring charisma +2, ring of protection +1, 196 gp

spells.antipaladin spells prepared:
(CL 4th; concentration +6)

2nd-silence (DC 14)

1st-death knell (DC 13), litany of weakness

sections.feats: Improved Critical (greatsword), Improved Initiative, Iron Will, Power Attack, Vital Strike, Weapon Focus (greatsword)
sections.special_qualities: cruelties (fatigued, staggered), fiendish boon (fiendish rhinoceros servant), touch of corruption 5/day (3d6)
sections.name: Ogre Destroyer
sections.combat_gear: potions of cure light wounds (2), potion of cure moderate wounds, potion of fly

sections.special_attacks: powerful charge (gore, 4d6+12), smite good 1/day as a swift action (+0 attack, +5 damage)

sections.body: An ogre destroyer is profane, disgusting, and filled with rage; nothing is safe from his murderous and hateful urges. He indulges every whim, revels in the powers granted by his dark patrons, and lives utterly free of all civilized restraint. He represents what people think of when they hear the word "antipaladin."

sections.name: Fiendish Rhinoceros Companion
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Ogres/Example Ogres/Ogre Destroyer/Fiendish Rhinoceros Companion
